description: This file defines an abstract repository interface and a mock in-memory implementation for managing and fetching recipe data within the recipe explorer project. It includes methods for retrieving recipes with optional filtering and contains mock recipe data for testing or development purposes.

classes.name: IRecipeRepository
classes.description: An abstract class defining the interface for recipe data repositories, with a method to fetch recipes optionally filtered by a search query.

classes.name: RecipeRepository
classes.description: A concrete implementation of IRecipeRepository that returns mock recipe data stored in-memory, with simulated network delay.

methods.name: fetchRecipes
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches a list of recipes, optionally filtered by the provided search query string.
